message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.CG, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with 3D pose estimation and triangular mesh based 3D reconstruction, which are common topics in computer vision (cs.CV) and computer graphics (cs.GR). The proposed method involves geometry and partial derivatives, which are also relevant to computational geometry (cs.CG). The use of statistical body shape models and optimization algorithms suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.MM) and optimization (cs.LG).
